## BlockDragger.dragIcons\_() method

Move all of the icons connected to this drag.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected dragIcons_(dxy: Coordinate): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dxy | Coordinate | How far to move the icons from their original positions, in workspace units. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
